use_cases_desc: UI distribution in a teaching situation. Mobile tourist guides that can distribute parts of their UI to a public display. Mobile shopping guide that can adapt its UI to whether the user is moving or not.
contribution_desc: A tool for supporting the development of context-dependent user interfaces that can adapt and distribute themselves across devices based on changes in context. They provide an authoring environment that allows developers and designers to interactively add rules and actions to contextual triggers like proximity to a public display, accelerometer changes etc. The toolkit is evaluated through a study with web developers trying to use the toolkit.
